profile:
Window Fashions Depot provides a large selection of interior & exterior window fashions; Shutters, Blinds, Shades, Drapery, Drapery Hardware and Specializes In Window Fashions Motorization. The Window Fashions Depot team is proud to share our passion for window coverings with home owners and businesses alike. 

We offer personalized and customized window covering designs that fit your needs and budget. The showroom is equipped with full sized displays, giving you the opportunity to easily see, touch, and compare products. Our experienced consultants are more than happy to work with you to achieve the look you desire, and offer free in-home consultations, with no obligations.

Adding the finishing touches to your space with style!
We carry a large selection of window coverings for every space.
Located in Toronto - we serve Toronto and the GTA.
Contact us for a quote - we are happy to help and be a part of your project. 

Services:
SHUTTERS
BLINDS & SHADES
AWNINGS
ROLLER SHUTTERS
DRAPERY
MOTORIZATION
WALLPAPER

profile:
RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL WINDOW COVERINGS ONTARIO, CANADA
Modern window fashion is family owned and operated and has been in operation for 26 years. We provide Residential Window Covering and Commercial Window Covering Services. Keeping our customers and new clients satisfied with the best quality Window Covering services and products. We have Professional Window Covering Installers with over 28 years of experience. Our service is second to none. All our Residential & Commercial Window Coverings Products are Candian made. We carry product from some of the top manufactures of window coverings in Canada. We warranty all our Window Covering Products.

We're social are:
https://www.facebook.com/Modern-Window-Fashion-106275197457173/
https://twitter.com/BarringtonMcLa1
services:
20-California And Plantation Wood Shutters
We carry the Best Quality in California, Plantation, Vinyl and Wood Shutters. Modern Window Fashion will transform any Window in your home from Traditional to Contemporary.


California And Plantation Vinyl Shutters
We carry the Best Quality in California, Plantation, Vinyl and Wood Shutters. Modern Window Fashion will transform any Window in your home from Traditional to Contemporary.




Blinds and Shades at Modern Window Fashion - Window Fashion Brampton
Window Blinds and Window Shades
Modern Window Fashion carries a large variety of different Window Blinds and Shades such as ROMAN SHADES, ZEBRA DUAL SHADES & VISION BLINDS, FAUX WOOD BLINDS and many more. All our Window Covering Products are made with the highest quality materials, UV protected and warranted.
Window Glass Replacement - Window Treatments Ottawa by Modern Window Fashion
Window Glass Replacement
Modern Window Fashion will replace the glass in your window if the glass or seal is broken and causing condensation between the two panes of glass.
Window Shutter Repair and Shutter Respray - Window Treatments Caledon by Modern Window Fashion
Window Shutter Repair and Shutter Respray
Modern Window Fashion will Repair and Respray your old existing Window Shutters making them like new again.
Door Inserts Stain Glass
Door Inserts Stain Glass
Our Stained Glass Door Inserts will give your old existing doors a new vibrant look.
Door Inserts Wrought Iron 
Door Inserts Wrought Iron
Our Wrought Iron Door Inserts will give your old existing doors a new vibrant look.

Expert Knowledge, Service
Since blinds are our personal business, we can guarantee expert knowledge and the very best in service from our highly trained staff. We ensure that they will cater to every need and detail in helping our customers find the perfect solution for their windows.

Best Value
For years, we have dedicated ourselves to providing the finest quality blinds and shades at competitive prices – delivered fast and custom made to our customers specifications. We guaranteed the best quality, service and selection.
